doc.title: E mo zai shen bian
doc.plot: Devil Beside You, originally a Japanese anime turn Taiwanese drama, basically revolves around a typical triangle effect. When Qi Yue's attempt to tell her crush, Yuan Yi, how she really feels falters; her world turns upside down as she becomes tormented by the schools Prince, Ah Meng, who ends up with the letter of her confession. Known for his devilish ways, Ah Meng always gets his way and he only desired Qi Yue. Qi Yue broke through his hard exterior and fell in love with the devil. Unfortunately, fate didn't agree on their union when they found out they were soon to be step-siblings.
